mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id as userId, u.nick_name as nickName, un.unitName, ( SELECT ROUND(SUM(bc.period), 1) AS time FROM edu_course bc LEFT JOIN edu_learning_record blr ON bc.id = blr.course_id LEFT JOIN sys_user bu ON bu.user_id = blr.user_id WHERE blr.study_type = 2 AND bc.course_type = 1 AND bu.user_id = u.user_id ) AS period FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_unit un ON un.id = u.unit WHERE u.del_flag = 0 and ( SELECT ROUND( SUM ( bc.period ) , 1 ) AS time FROM edu_course bc LEFT JOIN edu_learning_record blr ON bc.id = blr.course_id LEFT JOIN sys_user bu ON bu.user_id = blr.user_id WHERE blr.study_type = 2 AND bu.user_id = u.user_id ) != 0 ORDER BY period DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT DISTINCT u.user_id AS userId, u.nick_name AS nickName, un.unitName, ROUND( ( SELECT ROUND(SUM(DISTINCT lrf.time), 1) AS time FROM edu_learning_record lr LEFT JOIN edu_learning_record_file lrf ON lr.course_id = lrf.course_id WHERE lr.user_id = u.user_id AND lrf.user_id = u.user_id AND lr.study_type = 2 AND lrf.time != 0 ), 2 ) AS period FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_unit un ON un.id = u.unit WHERE u.del_flag = 0 AND ROUND( ( SELECT ROUND(SUM(DISTINCT lrf.time), 1) AS time FROM edu_learning_record lr LEFT JOIN edu_learning_record_file lrf ON lr.course_id = lrf.course_id WHERE lr.user_id = u.user_id AND lrf.user_id = u.user_id AND lr.study_type = 2 AND lrf.time != 0 ), 2 ) IS NOT NULL ORDER BY period DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT u.unitName, ROUND(( SELECT ROUND(sum(bc.period), 1) AS time FROM edu_course bc LEFT JOIN edu_learning_record blr ON bc.id = blr.course_id LEFT JOIN sys_user bu ON bu.user_id = blr.user_id WHERE blr.study_type = 2 AND bu.unit = u.id AND bu.del_flag = 0 ) / ( SELECT COUNT( bu.user_id ) FROM sys_user bu WHERE bu.unit = u.id and bu.del_flag = 0 ), 1 ) AS period FROM sys_unit u WHERE ROUND( ( SELECT ROUND(sum(bc.period), 1) AS time FROM edu_course bc LEFT JOIN edu_learning_record blr ON bc.id = blr.course_id LEFT JOIN sys_user bu ON bu.user_id = blr.user_id WHERE blr.study_type = 2 AND bu.unit = u.id AND bu.del_flag = 0 ) / ( SELECT COUNT( bu.user_id ) FROM sys_user bu WHERE bu.unit = u.id AND bu.del_flag = 0 ), 1 ) IS NOT NULL ORDER BY period DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT u.unitName, ROUND( ( SELECT sum(DISTINCT blrf.time) FROM sys_user bu LEFT JOIN edu_learning_record blr ON blr.user_id = bu.user_id LEFT JOIN edu_learning_record_file blrf ON blrf.user_id = bu.user_id AND blr.course_id = blrf.course_id WHERE bu.del_flag = 0 AND blr.study_type = 2 AND bu.unit = u.id AND bu.del_flag = 0 ) / (SELECT COUNT(bu.user_id) FROM sys_user bu WHERE bu.del_flag = 0 AND bu.unit = u.id), 2 ) AS period FROM sys_unit u WHERE ROUND( ( SELECT sum(DISTINCT blrf.time) FROM sys_user bu LEFT JOIN edu_learning_record blr ON blr.user_id = bu.user_id LEFT JOIN edu_learning_record_file blrf ON blrf.user_id = bu.user_id AND blr.course_id = blrf.course_id WHERE bu.del_flag = 0 AND blr.study_type = 2 AND bu.unit = u.id AND bu.del_flag = 0 ) / (SELECT COUNT(bu.user_id) FROM sys_user bu WHERE bu.del_flag = 0 AND bu.unit = u.id), 2 ) IS NOT NULL ORDER BY period DESC LIMIT 10
